definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (prop. clan—name, cf. Sta:ZAW v (1885). 166 f., cf. Sab. [[שמר]] Os:13, but N Aram. 4imor DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1885), 14 Sab Denkm:30);—Sem(m)hr, etc.:
´[[שׁ]]: orig. owner of hill where Sam. was built 1Ki 16:24, 1Ki 16:24.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in Asher 1Ch 7:34, A LXXL Swmhr; = [[שׁׂמֵר]] v:1Ch 7:32.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in Benj. 1Ch 8:12 van d. H.; > [[שֶׁטֶד]] q.v. p. 1029
